footer.tagline: Dialisis.MY is a platform that helps you find dialysis centres in Malaysia.

status.noCentersDescription: Sorry, there are no dialysis centres that match your search criteria.

onlineStatus.onlineDescription: You can now use all app features.

quality.title: Quality Hemodialysis Care
quality.description: Our centre offers high-quality dialysis treatment with modern equipment and experienced staff.

team.title: Experienced & Friendly Team
team.description: Our medical team consists of experienced, friendly professionals providing the best care to patients.

access.title: Easy access with parking
access.description: A strategic location with ample parking for patient and visitor convenience.

comfort.title: Clean, air-conditioned treatment space
comfort.description: Clean and comfortable treatment rooms with air-conditioning for patient comfort during sessions.

stateList.empty: No dialysis centres found in {state}{town, select( '' '' other ' for {town}')}

header.title: Dialysis Centres in {location}
header.summary: There are {totalCenters} dialysis centres in {locationName}.{totalCenters, plural, =0 { } other { This includes {moh} MOH centres, {private} private centres, {hepB} centres with Hepatitis B facilities, and {hepC} centres with Hepatitis C facilities.}}

seo.title: About Dialysis Services in {location}
seo.overview: {locationName} has {totalCenters} dialysis centres providing kidney treatment services for patients in need. These centres include {moh} under the Ministry of Health (MOH) and {private} private centres.
seo.services: Most centres provide hemodialysis ({hemodialysisCenters} centres){peritonealCenters, plural, =0 {, while some also offer peritoneal dialysis and other treatments.} other {, while {peritonealCenters} centres offer peritoneal dialysis and other treatments.}}{hepatitisBCenters, plural, =0 {} other { There are also {hepatitisBCenters} centres with dedicated facilities for Hepatitis B and C patients.}}
seo.access: Patients needing dialysis in {location} can choose between subsidised MOH centres or private centres that provide additional facilities and services. All dialysis centres in Malaysia must meet the quality standards set by the Ministry of Health.
seo.none: Currently, no dialysis centres are recorded in {locationName}. Patients in this area may need to seek treatment at the nearest centres in other parts of {stateName}. Please contact the nearest hospital or clinic for a referral to a suitable dialysis centre.

treatments.hemodialysis: Hemodialysis: A treatment that uses a dialysis machine to remove toxins and excess fluids from the blood. Typically done three times a week, with each session lasting 3-4 hours.
treatments.peritoneal: Peritoneal Dialysis: A treatment that uses the peritoneal membrane as a natural filter. Can be done at home and offers more flexibility for patients.
treatments.transplant: Kidney Transplant: The best option for suitable patients, where a healthy kidney from a donor is transplanted to the patient.

state.title: Dialysis Centres in {stateName} - {total} Available
state.description: Find dialysis centres in {stateName}. There are {total} centres including {moh} MOH centres and {private} private centres. Complete details for locations, phone numbers and services.

state.twitterDescription: Find dialysis centres in {stateName} with full details.

content.title: About Us
content.missionDescription: Dialisis.MY was founded to make it easier for kidney patients in Malaysia to find a dialysis centre that fits their needs. We believe that access to accurate, complete information is vital when making health decisions.

content.title: Privacy Policy
content.intro: Dialisis.my is committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use and safeguard your personal information when you use our website.

collection.title: 1. Information We Collect
collection.description: We collect information you provide directly to us through:

usage.title: 2. How We Use Information
usage.description: We use the information collected to:

protection.title: 3. Data Protection
protection.description: We take appropriate security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, alteration or disclosure.

sharing.title: 4. Information Sharing
sharing.description: We will not sell, rent or trade your personal information with third parties without your consent, except as required by law.

cookies.title: 5. Cookies and Tracking
cookies.description: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to collect information about website usage and enhance user experience.

items.object: Object to the processing of your information

changes.title: 7. Changes to This Policy
changes.description: We reserve the right to change this policy at any time. Any changes will be announced on this website.

contact.title: 8. Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or our practices, please contact us through the Contact page.

metadata.twitterDescription: The terms and conditions for using the Dialisis.my platform. Please read carefully before using our services.

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.description: Welcome to Dialisis.my. By accessing and using this website, you agree to be bound by the terms and conditions outlined below.

usage.title: 2. Use of Content
usage.description: All content on Dialisis.my is protected by copyright. You may view and download content for personal, non-commercial use only.

info.title: 3. Dialysis Centre Information
info.description: Information about dialysis centres displayed on this website is for informational purposes only. We strive for accuracy but do not guarantee completeness or correctness.

disclaimer.title: 4. Disclaimer
disclaimer.description: Dialisis.my is not responsible for any loss or damage arising from the use of information on this website. Users are advised to verify information directly with the respective dialysis centres.

changes.title: 5. Changes to Terms
changes.description: We reserve the right to change these terms and conditions at any time. Changes take effect immediately after being posted on this website.

law.title: 6. Governing Law
law.description: These terms and conditions are governed by Malaysian law and any disputes will be resolved in Malaysian courts.

contact.title: 7. Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about these terms and conditions, please contact us via the Contact page.
